articles.description: CHRISTOPHER STEVENS reviews the BBC's latest natural history epic with David Attenborough at the helm, Frozen Planet II.
articles.content:
Rating: 
Have thermal long johns, will travel. The life of a wildlife film-maker on Sir David Attenboroughs natural history epics is always tough but the ordeals of the Frozen Planet II crew defy be… [+3726 chars]
